title: What are some best Percabeth fanfiction? - Quora

response.answer_text: I love the percabeth fanfictions written by them Notaguestanymore (The author's percabeth one shot tangent is my favourite one shot fic of all time) herecomesthepun (Amazing author, her one shots and stories are ambrosia in the fanfictions world) Thewritingmaniac (if herecomesthepun was ambrosia, this author is the nectar, 'cause her one shots were equally amazing and quite unique) seaweedbraens (her one shots are so great, if her one shots were food, I could live of it) Akatsuki child (OMG, read her fanfic artificial engagement the 5th time, still laughing so hard) Luna-Incendia 14 (read her fanfic heart by heart, can't even put in words how much I loved it, all the emotion…damn) There are many more equally amazing author's, who I couldn't mention 'cause I didn't remember their fanfic name. Honourable mention to The AU girl, couldn't include her in the list ‘cause she hasn't completed her thirteen reasons why AU for percabeth that she started. This ones on Wattpad. Amazing really, and not at all the imitation of thirteen reasons why, in fact a whole other story written in that context, Annabeth being Hana and Percy being Clay. I hope she updates…

I personally love the Split Souls Percy Jackson and Avengers crossover on Wattpad. There are two books so far, Before I Die, and the second one is We’re Not Dead Yet. While there is Percabeth in it, there isn’t much, but it is a great book series and sure is worth the read! The second one is still in progress, but it is really good! It’s by MarshmallowMilkshake, if I’m not mistaken.
